context: Created comprehensive ThunderKittens GPU DSL tutorial using documentation-tutorial and building-artifacts skills
reproducible_prompt: TUTORIAL on thunder kittens as a GPU DSL

effectiveness.documentation-tutorial: Highly effective - provided clear structure and code-first principles
effectiveness.building-artifacts: Effective - successfully created interactive artifact, though encountered bundling issues

patterns: WebSearch → WebFetch for extracting real code examples from documentation
Vite build + custom inline script as alternative to Parcel
Mental model boxes enhance understanding of complex systems
challenges: Parcel bundling failed due to @swc/core signature issues
TypeScript unused imports caused build failures

outcomes.quality: Production-ready tutorial with executable code examples
